content: next single_crochet 2 single_crochet * repeat from * 2x 8 6 8 single_crochet 7 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet* repeat from * 2x 10 8-10 10 single_crochet finish off leaving a long tail for sewing to body stuff firmly now we will attach the body to head and then the arms to body in the appropriate places of course with a spare length of tan tack one hand to leia s hip for that extra attitude now for the hair hood belt and gun hood this may seem tricky but you will essentially form a ring which will be two rounds then using the single_crochet of the ring you will begin to work a flat piece which will be seamed together to form the hood leaving a long tail this is for tacking the hood to the body with white or off-white chain 24 and join into a loop with a slip_stitch to the first st work 2 rounds of 24 work slip_stitch over 12 st in order to reach the center of the front with the long tail in the center back v 1 2 updated july 31 2011 www woollybytes com ©2007-2011 roxanne wood working back and forth now work 16 row of 24 single_crochet each with a slip_stitch join the last st of the row to the first st of the row and seam the hood piece together with slip_stitch ending in the middle of the row finish off and weave in end with the long tail from the beginning tack the hood to the body you may have to really squeeze the head through but it fits hair work as for body up to round 6 36 st work 2 rounds of 36 single_crochet single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet* repeat from * 5x more 30 work 2 rounds of 30 finish off leaving a long tail for tacking hair piece to head you may want to secure the buns first buns make 2 work rounds 1-5 of body 30 st next round work 15 single_crochet decrease 15 st finish off leaving a tail long enough to sew bun to hair piece belt chain 30 and place in appropriate place blaster rifle with black chain 11 work single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook work a double decrease by picking up 1 loop in each of the next 3 chain and crocheting all loops on hook together work single_crochet in each chain to the end finish off and secure to hand i would love to see your finished leia and i hoped you enjoyed the pattern v 1 2 updated july 31 2011 www woollybytes com ©2007-2011 roxanne wood
